title: Intro Cognitive Psyc
description: Examines the foundations of Cognitive Psychology including methods, analysis techniques and psychological theories involved in perception, attention, memory, problem solving, decision making, and language.  Credit not allowed for both PSYC 3012 and PSYC 3011.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Majors:

prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
